Reviews.Content: A very dissapointing service and attitude
Reviews.Author: lippu

Reviews.Content: Terrible Rooms Now before I start I must say I do realise this a cheap hotel and not a 5 star accomodation, however we were terribly dissapointed in the room when we checked into the hotel in July 08.The room was in terrible condition, obvious water damage from above room(huge green mouldly stain running down the wall near the bed)Large hole in the wall with live electrical wires hanging out with dodgy bits of tape hanging off them, extremely unsafe!The air con did turn on however failed to cool at all, even with mild weather we were experiencing in bali last week.The room had a very strong musky damp smell that you could not ignore which just added to the unclean feeling of the place.The room did have a small corner lounge in it however this was filthy dirty and also smelt like it had never been cleaned.Not a huge deal but the phone also didnt work.I did ask if there was another room and I was simply dismissed at their reception by saying NO, maybe I could come back to reception again tomorrow and ask again.Thankfuly as Bali was very busy I was lucky enough to find alternative accomodation and we checked out the same day so we didnt even have to spend to one night there.As I mentioned before I know this is a cheaper hotel, however in 7 trips to Bali we have never encountered a room that we wouldnt consider sleeping untill this one.I our opinion we think there are many better options to stay in the Kuta area in the same price range and would steer people away from this hotel untill they do some serious renovating.Having said this I have eaten several times on previous trips at the restauraunt and the food has always been good wuth friendly staff. We have also visited the melast Spa at the front of this hotel and found that to be great too.Not sure if we just got a crap room but hopefully this will save other people from the same dissappointment.
Reviews.Author: cralinz

Reviews.Content: Still Loved the Melasti Bungalows!       dinner at bubba gumps!
